=== ''Dune: Prophecy'' === {{Main|Dune: Prophecy{{!}}''Dune: Prophecy''}} In June 2019, [[Legendary Television]] announced it is producing a spin-off series, ''Dune: The Sisterhood'', for [[WarnerMedia]]'s streaming service, [[HBO Max]]. The series serves as a prequel to the film and centers on the [[Bene Gesserit]]. Initially, Villeneuve was going to direct the series' pilot, with Spaihts writing the screenplay and Dana Calvo as showrunner for the series.<ref>{{cite web |last=Petski |first=Denise |date=July 23, 2019 |title=Dana Calvo To Co-Run ''Dune: The Sisterhood'' Under New Overall Deal With Legendary TV Studios |url=https://deadline.com/2019/07/dana-calvo-to-co-run-dune-the-sisterhood-under-new-overall-deal-with-legendary-tv-studios-1202651452/ |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190723230549/https://deadline.com/2019/07/dana-calvo-to-co-run-dune-the-sisterhood-under-new-overall-deal-with-legendary-tv-studios-1202651452/ |archive-date=July 23, 2019 |access-date=July 24, 2019 |website=[[Deadline Hollywood]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=Schaefer |first=Sandy |date=July 23, 2019 |title=''Dune: The Sisterhood'' Series Gets a Female Co-Showrunner |url=https://screenrant.com/dune-sisterhood-series-showrunners/ |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190724134334/https://screenrant.com/dune-sisterhood-series-showrunners/ |archive-date=July 24, 2019 |access-date=July 24, 2019 |website=[[Screen Rant]]}}</ref> In November 2019, Spaihts left the series as writer to focus on the sequel film.<ref name="dune sisterhood spaihts" /> Spaihts and Villeneuve remain as executive producers along with Brian Herbert, Byron Merritt, and Kim Herbert.<ref>{{cite web |last=Otterson |first=Joe |date=June 10, 2019 |title=''Dune'' Series Ordered at WarnerMedia Streaming Service, Denis Villeneuve to Direct |url=https://variety.com/2019/tv/news/dune-series-bene-gesserit-warnermedia-streaming-service-1203238799/ |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190611000442/https://variety.com/2019/tv/news/dune-series-bene-gesserit-warnermedia-streaming-service-1203238799/ |archive-date=June 11, 2019 |access-date=June 10, 2019 |website=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]}}</ref> In July 2021, Diane Ademu-John took over as showrunner.<ref>{{cite web |last=Otterson |first=Joe |date=July 22, 2021 |title=''Dune'' HBO Max Series Enlists Diane Ademu-John as New Showrunner (EXCLUSIVE) |url=https://variety.com/2021/tv/news/dune-tv-series-hbo-max-showrunner-diane-ademu-john-1235024854/ |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210722160643/https://variety.com/2021/tv/news/dune-tv-series-hbo-max-showrunner-diane-ademu-john-1235024854/ |archive-date=July 22, 2021 |access-date=July 22, 2021 |website=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]] |language=en}}</ref> Spaihts and Villeneuve confirmed in March 2022 that the show is still in development.<ref name=Ellwood /> In April 2022, it was announced that [[Johan Renck]] will direct the first two episodes.<ref>{{cite web |last=White |first=Peter |date=April 27, 2022 |title='Dune: The Sisterhood' Series Taps 'Chernobyl' Director Johan Renck To Helm First Two Episodes |url=https://deadline.com/2022/04/dune-the-sisterhood-series-director-johan-renck-1235011184/ |url-status=live |website=[[Deadline Hollywood]]}}</ref> [[Travis Fimmel]] joined the cast in November 2022.<ref>{{cite web |last=Otterson |first=Joe |date=November 8, 2022 |title='Dune' Prequel Series at HBO Max In February 2023, it was announced that production was put on hiatus as Renck exited the project.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Cordero |first1=Rosy |last2=Andreeva |first2=Nellie |title=''Dune: The Sisterhood'': Director Johan Renck & Star Shirley Henderson Exit HBO Max Series Amid Creative Overhaul & Production Hiatus |url=https://deadline.com/2023/02/dune-the-sisterhood-director-johan-renck-shirley-henderson-exit-hbo-max-series-1235273486/ |website=[[Deadline Hollywood]] |access-date=March 1, 2023 |date=February 28, 2023 |archive-date=May 7, 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230507184824/https://deadline.com/2023/02/dune-the-sisterhood-director-johan-renck-shirley-henderson-exit-hbo-max-series-1235273486/ |url-status=live}}</ref> The series was retitled ''Dune: Prophecy'' in November 2023.<ref name="Fall2024">{{Cite web |last=Iannucci |first=Rebecca |date=November 2, 2023 |title=HBO Lays Out 2024 Release Plan for ''House of the Dragon'', ''Curb'' and Others |url=https://tvline.com/news/house-of-the-dragon-season-2-release-date-hbo-update-1235069564/ |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20231102162825/https://tvline.com/news/house-of-the-dragon-season-2-release-date-hbo-update-1235069564/ |archive-date=November 2, 2023 |access-date=November 2, 2023 |website=[[TVLine]]}}</ref>
